typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		BK_leadid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		custom_territorioid as string,
		custom_productid as string,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		HASHKEY as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownwer as integer,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		territory as integer,
		product as integer,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		haskey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
STG derive(STGHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(leadsource),toString(statuscode),toString(industry),toString(modifiedon),upper(toString(custom_territorioid)),upper(toString(custom_productid)),toString(rating),toString(employees),toInteger(toString(revenue),'############'))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, DWH lookup(STG@SK_leadid == DWH@SK_leadid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(haskey),
	haskey != STGHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownwer as integer,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		territory as integer,
		product as integer,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		haskey as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_leadid = Split@Nuevos@SK_leadid,
		createdon = Split@Nuevos@createdon,
		ownwer,
		leadsource = Split@Nuevos@leadsource,
		statuscode = Split@Nuevos@statuscode,
		industry = Split@Nuevos@industry,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		territory,
		product,
		rating = Split@Nuevos@rating,
		employees = Split@Nuevos@employees,
		revenue = Split@Nuevos@revenue,
		haskey = STGHASH
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownwer as integer,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		territory as integer,
		product as integer,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		haskey as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_leadid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_leadid = Split@Actualizaciones@SK_leadid,
		createdon = Split@Actualizaciones@createdon,
		ownwer,
		leadsource = Split@Actualizaciones@leadsource,
		statuscode = Split@Actualizaciones@statuscode,
		industry = Split@Actualizaciones@industry,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		territory,
		product,
		rating = Split@Actualizaciones@rating,
		employees = Split@Actualizaciones@employees,
		revenue = Split@Actualizaciones@revenue,
		haskey = STGHASH
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
